Uses of Interface
com.dlsc.flexgantt.swing.layer.system.IPopupRenderer

  • Packages that use IPopupRenderer 
    Package Description
    com.dlsc.flexgantt.swing.layer.system
    Contains the system layers for drawing the background, grid lines, popups, relationships, controls, spreadsheets, overviews, global events and activities.

    • Uses of IPopupRenderer in com.dlsc.flexgantt.swing.layer.system

      Classes in com.dlsc.flexgantt.swing.layer.system that implement IPopupRenderer 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AbstractPopupRenderer
      An abstract popup renderer implementation which can be used to provide a consistent apperance of all popup renderers used within the same application.
      class  DefaultPopupRenderer
      A popup renderer implementation that uses a JTextArea to display the string returned from invoking Object.toString() on the popup value object.
      Methods in com.dlsc.flexgantt.swing.layer.system that return IPopupRenderer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      IPopupRenderer PopupLayer.getPopupRenderer(Class cl)
      Returns a popup renderer for a given popup value type.
      Methods in com.dlsc.flexgantt.swing.layer.system with parameters of type IPopupRenderer 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void PopupLayer.setPopupRenderer(Class objectType, IPopupRenderer renderer)
      Maps the implementation of a popup renderer to a popup object definition.
